alert.note: Alert for North Cass; North Itasca; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 3:10PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Itasca and north central Cass Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 309 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Winnibigoshish, or 25 miles east of Bemidji, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bena around 340 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Six Mile Lake and Portage Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. This storm may intensify. Monitor local NOAA Weather Radio, commercial radio, or television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: North Cass; North Itasca; South Itasca
